title: icam - Integrative, Complementary, and Alternative Medicine Interest Group
cleaned_text: Medicine Interest Group Description:Integrative Medicine is the practice of medicine that reaffirms the importance of the relationship between practitioner and patient, focuses on the whole person, is informed by evidence, and makes use of all appropriate therapeutic approaches, healthcare professionals and disciplines to achieve optimal health and healing. The ICAM Interest Group is a student organization at the Pritzker School of Medicine seeking to educate the students and the broader community on the field of integrative, complementary, and alternative medicine.
